name: Eerie Escape Game
description:
Download the EXE!

Eerie Escape is a 3D Horror Escape indie game.
There are three items that are interactable throughout the game, Keys,Puzzle Pieces and an Eerie item.

To Escape you must find the puzzle pieces to uncover a key that unlocks a trap door hidden within the house, After you must find the correct key by trying each key at the door to see which one helps you escape, Then you must try to make your Eerie Escape through the dark maze..But try not to run into the enemy!!

-How to play-
Mouse Look and WASD 
G to pick up Items (Keys,Puzzle Pieces and One Eerie Item)

Game made from scratch by a team of TWO in just Three WEEKS! - Demo'd at DUBLIN COMIC CON 2018

Comment Your Quickest Time: Time to beat; Tom- 98
